title: Spice
typeOfFood: Indian, Organic, Take-out, Asian, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A fast-casual, Indian-influenced restaurant opened since early-2014. Kitchen is conscientious about preparing your food to your specifications. There are vegetarian choices, and the veggies used are fresh not frozen or canned. Curry rice bowl, squash lentil cake (similar to a veggies burger), samosa, dahl, day's soup.
